sources.title: The Reckoning
sources.description: * Released: 1932-02-15 * (Eng US) * Crime Thriller 1930s Pre-Code B&W Film * J.H. Hoffberg Company Inc. * PRODUCER: J.H. Hoffberg * DIRECTOR: Harry Fraser * AUTHOR: Dwight Cummings * ADAPTATION & DIALOGUE: Leon Lee * STARRING: Sally Blane (Loretta Young's older sister); James Murray; Edmund Breese; Tom Jackson; Mildred Golden; Bryant Washburn; Douglas Scott * SYNOPSIS: Two young lovers caught up in the underworld decide to get out and go straight, but a gang leader has other plans for them. * SOURCE: 1) MrFilmschatten 2) LETTERBOXD * I own zero rights to this film and upload for Educational Purposes only, for all present and future generations. Doreen (def gp ddh)

sources.title: The Reckoning (1932) PRE-CODE HOLLYWOOD
sources.description:
PizzaFLIX Presents CLASSIC MOVIE MONDAY
Stars: Sally Blane, James Murray, Edmund Breese 
Director Harry L. Fraser

In this pre-code Crime Drama, two young lovers want to quit the jewel-thieving racket but their ring leader has other plans.

.

metadata.Plot: Terry, a crook, and his moll Judy try to go straight, but Terry's boss will not release him. When Judy gets a regular job working for a millionaire, Terry's boss Doc robs his safe, but he is killed in the ensuing struggle. Judy and Terry are suspects until the detective, who witnessed the robbery, clears them.
metadata.Writer: Dwight Cummins, Harry L. Fraser, Leon Lee
metadata.Actors: Sally Blane, James Murray, Edmund Breese
